reviews.review: Avengers Infinity war was great but it didn't feel like a movie that was build up for 10 years. But still it was a great movie.
Amazing movie. Handled the huge cast well and had a great plot. Was extremely well done. Thanos is one of the best villains to date.

Truly the culmination of everything that’s come before it (and I mean EVERYTHING). The film is an incredible achievement and proof that the Russo’s are the masters of comic book films. I wouldn’t say it’s a perfect movie, as i could certainly nitpick at a few flaws, but they’re all so overshadowed by the positive. It was everything I hoped it would be
The best movie I have seen in a marvel movie ever.
Thrilling but disappointed at the end

The climax of the MCU, Infinity War is not what one would expect. Although it lasts 2 hours and 40 minutes, it has no downtime, It doesn't have moments that are not incredible. It is a battle, a war, choral and incredible. Thanos, the true protagonist of the film, is definitely the best villain of the whole MCU.

This movie was excellent! I cannot wait to see how they end the story in the next Avengers movie!! It was really well balanced just enough comedy, action, etc. Some of the surprises were not expected at all. This is a must see if you are a comicbook/superhero fan.
Marvel has been building this film for 10 years and they delivered! Problably the best one they have made to date.
no words to describe the greatness of this movie

When you become so attached to characters, to see the Russo brothers do such a great job of bringing it together without it feeling cheesy, that's an accomplishment in and of itself.  

But this went above and beyond.  This was an emotionally and visually charged roller coaster that just kept feeding the reason you go to the movies.  Finally a challenge for the Avengers that isn't just part of the story line.  Thanos was brilliantly written and acted.  I'm glad we don't have to wait 3 years for the follow up.  

Very well done Marvel!!!!
